text: 17:7 Godɨn Araziba 31:16; 32:17; 2 Eghaghaniba 11:15; Onger Akaba 106:37; 1 Korin 10:20Ia Israelia uam aseba bagh asɨzibar ofabar amuan markɨ. Ia faragha kamaghɨn amua, na tegha asebar gɨn ghue.17:7 Gumazir maba ghaze, aser kam, a memen asemɨn mɨngari. Eghtɨ ian gɨn otivamin adarazi zurara asɨziba inigh ofa bagh nan Purirpenimɨn izɨ.
